column4: Is there a guide somewhere to set up a virtual mail system under ubuntu?  spamassasin, virtual mailboxes, virus checking, user access to password, etc over web, webmail, etc?
http://high5.net/ <- There's a pretty good howto on setting up postfix - google has _lots_ of howtos on that subject.
The high5 one was the one I was planning on following - i was just hoping for something ubuntu-stamped ... the quality and completeness is generally better when the U people actually bless it. :)
I think you can go with anything "debian". :) I haven't tried on Ubuntu (I use plain debian for my servers)...
